title: Forums "It broke"
body:
So on the old forums every now and again the temporary data cluster fucks my ability to view threads or post and I have to delete my temp data for the forums so I no longer get the Gragas "It broke" page.

Will this same temp data problem exist with the boards?

replies.body: I suggest you look it up. I mean, other servers have had the boards for quite a while really, so maybe you'll be able to find some information on it.
